words.content: It’s really getting crazy.
What ?! What do you mean ?
I find it so dehumanizing to implement technologic materials inside my own body. What’s the purpose of paying with our hand?
I don’t know, it would be so much easier if everyone had one.
Having an only card could be enough. With their transhumanism, they are not modifying what’s around us but what’s inside us. But for what purpose? Make us happier?

words.content_before: Of course ! Look, transhumanism is saving lots of lives. In medicine,
words.content_link: researcher are able to correct genetic anomalies and remove sick cells

words.content: At first sight, it is. Except that we don’t think at what’s coming after.
What do you mean ?

Well if you can modify sick genes, it means that you can modify every type of genes. Things will get out of control. We will be able to choose the eye color of our childs, their gender, their hair or their strength. We will be able to increase their  mental aptitudes, make them stronger or smarter.
Up to you, would it be a bad thing ?
Clearly ! Making diseases disappear and becoming Man-God is an utopy. Focusing on increasing physical and mental performances implies forgetting what defines humanity.
So you really think that curing someone’s cancer or helping a former tetraplegic walk again is the same thing as being dehumanized ?
No of course not. But problems come from misbehavior.
They will not necessary be misbehavior.
Hey wake up ! Of course there will be, there are some already.
Oh yeah ? Name one.
Hey wake up ! Of course there will be, there are some already.

words.content: It’s amazing !
Amazing yes, if you can afford it
And why couldn’t we?
Because it would be so expensive. These devices will be affordable to a few minority that can afford it. A huge gap will be created, expanding even more wealth inequality.
*thinking*
You should definitely watch the movie “Welcome to Gattaca”, you will get my point..

It’s not-too-distant future in which the society analyzes your DNA and determines where you belong in society. In a nutshell, humans are not equal anymore.
What does equality has to do with all of this?
